entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint test failing with multithreaded build - `CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #81646
  • packages.microsoft.com apt update is veeerrryy slooow (1-2 sec per source) #81645
  • Optimize Vector.Create("utf8-literal"u8) #81643
    8.0.0
  • PlatformNotSupportedException thrown by System.Drawing.Common on net7.0-windows10.0.22621.0 #81639
  • JIT: annotate pseudo-edges in pgo schema and/or internal model #81638
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: an issue around runtime lookup #81637
    Future
  • CultureInfo.KeyboardLayoutId returns wrong values for many cultures #81633
  • Excessive allocations in HttpContent.ReadAsByteArrayAsync #81628

Closed

  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: System.IO.Ports is currently only supported on Windows. on Archlinux #79196
    8.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] Add a CI lane for a new wasi RID #72641
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.UpgradeToGeneratedRegexAnalyzerTests.NoDiagnosticsForNet60(invocationType: StaticMethods) #81586
  • Optimize `Enum.GetUnderlyingType` with a known type to a constant #70483
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ClientCertificates_Test ci failures #81405
  • [API Proposal]: Casting INumber<T> to int and double #80318
  • [wasm] `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` - `memory access out of bounds` #81558

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, wasi
  • [wasi] Support builds with no relinking #81648
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • [wasm] CI: add wasi jobs to runtime-wasm #81647
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, wasi
  • [Jiterpreter] Add support for TryGetHashCode intrinsic #81644
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, community-contribution
  • Set UseLLVMLinker=true when targeting FreeBSD by default #81642
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add a missing assert in constraint resolver #81641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update owner for are:System.Transactions #81640
    area-Meta
  • Adjust impNormStructVal to not wrap in GT_OBJ #81636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • don't send server_name when literal IP #81631
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Optimize ReplaceLineEndings #81630
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81629
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • Lazily initialize base state for Random-derived type #81627
  • Use initialCapacity in ASN.1 templates for some primitives #81626
    area-System.Security
  • DO NOT MERGE - EXPERIMENTAL PR #81625
    NO-MERGE

Merged

  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Count in a few places #81325
    area-Meta
  • Upstream a few changes from the NativeAOT-LLVM branch #81616
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Suppress clang-16 warnings #81573
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Generate StandardOptimizationData uncompressed #81624
  • Generate StandardOptimizationData uncompressed #81623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix -Wformat violations #81618
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter field op refactorings; fixes #81558 #81620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prep for new diagnostic work and tests #81571
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make internal FrozenHashTable non-generic #81603
    area-System.Collections

Updated

  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add RIDs for Wolfi #81589
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` for small types #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2104822 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use MiniDumpWriteDump to create dumps on Windows #81509
    area-Infrastructure
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [Mono] Enable AOT to print out the list of compiled methods #81567
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider NullReferenceException #66694
  • IDE0200 (lambda expression can be removed) results in compile error (ConditionalAttribute) #63464
  • Wrong results from VB variable.Type.ToString #7698
    Backlog
  • Exception ex{"OperatorToken"} #4067
    Backlog
  • No classification in QuickInfo for variables of an aliased type #16353
    Backlog

Updated

  • Test plan for "collection literals" #66418
    C# 12.0
  • Codelens wrongly count multiple file-local types up from multiple files whose names are same #64592
    17.5
  • Semantic analysis does not work properly in .NET 5 iff executed in a test environment #52954
    17.6 P2
  • Add "Initialize Interactive with Project" support for projects other than .NET Framework #26934
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • Tweak LSIF's MSBuild discovery logic #66709
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not suggest replacing lambda with method group if the invoked mehod has `Conditional` attribute #66699
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Enable MSBuild COMM log #66708
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Properly classify aliases in quick info #66701
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE
  • Add API to determine what capabilities the runtime supports #66706
    Area-Compilers
  • Support structure guides for #if directives #66702
    Area-IDE
  • Add some EE and EnC tests for primary constructors #66677
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: caching #46460
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #46459
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #46451
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext, plaintext #46450
  • Perf improvement: json #46449
  • Using minimal APIs source generator results in null dereference warnings (CS8602) #46446

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, plaintext #46377
  • Cannot build ASP.NET Core 7 app for Raspberry Pi 4 #46306
  • Visual studio analyzer error for bang bang operator #46453
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #46440
  • Any guide about SignalR client npm package upgrade? #46448

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2104780 #46458
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump http-cache-semantics from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 in /src/ProjectTemplates/test/Templates.Blazor.Tests #46457
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump http-cache-semantics from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 in /src/ProjectTemplates/test/Templates.Tests #46455
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Unquarantined GrpcTemplate #46452
    area-mvc, area-grpc
  • Update gRPC template dependencies for AOT #46447
    area-grpc

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSB4018 WinAppSdkGenerateAppxPackageRecipe .NET Maui compile error #13117
  • C # long/Int64 type conversion error！ #13116

Closed

  • ApplyQueryAttributes when go back to one tab and two views is invoked in the wrong view #12957
  • MAUI App build/compiles and runs fine on Windows but fails to build/compile for Android: com.android.tools.r8.CompilationFailedException #9413
  • I cannot run a new MAUI blazor project on windows. #8357
  • DesignMode.IsDesignModeEnabled not working as expected. #7773
  • [BUG} PlatformImage.FromStream doesn't create an IImage, returns null #11992
  • Add support for Android queryProductDetails #9034
  • First .NET MAUI demo does not display on screen #12277
  • Can't Access Raw Asset Path #7943
  • Objective-Sharpie not working anymore, needs .NET 6 update. #7755
  • Assertion failure in -[UIApplication _createStatusBarWithRequestedStyle:orientation:hidden:], UIApplication.m:5461 #9360
  • Assertion failure #8835
  • .NET MAUI-Content Page template broken #8896
  • exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12984
  • Stacklayout within stacklayout not centering correctly #8166
  • IsEnabled doesn't update visual state after being updated with INotifyPropertyChanged when displaying shell alert on Windows 10 #8877
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • [Proposal] Organize partial classes inside Controls #13113
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Essentials] add Bluetooth permissions #12413
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
